dict.acceptation: 胡萝卜；〈非正式〉好处，回报；不能兑现的报酬；

sent.orig: A carrot, a carrot, a carrot, a carrot.
sent.trans: 一根胡萝卜，一根胡萝卜，一根胡萝卜，一根胡萝卜。

sent.orig: The rabbit wants a carrot, a carrot, a carrot.
sent.trans: 兔子想要一根胡萝卜，一根胡萝卜，一根胡萝卜。

sent.orig: Wash asparaguses and carrot. Dice asparaguses and shred carrot. Blanch. Then rinse in cold water.
sent.trans: 把芦笋和甘笋洗净，芦笋切粒，甘笋切丝，飞水过冷河，备用。

sent.orig: Using honey as stabilizer in carrot juice, Stability of carrot juice was raised.
sent.trans: 用蜂蜜作胡萝卜汁的稳定剂，可使胡萝卜汁的稳定性增强。

sent.orig: Fox: Wa! There is a big carrot. Now, the carrot belongs to me.
sent.trans: 狐狸：哇！有一个大萝卜。现在，这个萝卜属于我了。
